概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

android.content
接口 SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener

正在封闭接口：
SharedPreferences
public static interface SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener

Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a shared preference is changed.

方法摘要
 void onSharedPreferenceChanged(SharedPreferences sharedPreferences, String key)
          Called when a shared preference is changed, added, or removed.
 

方法详细信息

onSharedPreferenceChanged

void onSharedPreferenceChanged(SharedPreferences sharedPreferences,
                               String key)
Called when a shared preference is changed, added, or removed. This may be called even if a preference is set to its existing value.

参数：
sharedPreferences - The SharedPreferences that received the change.
key - The key of the preference that was changed, added, or removed.
